head.title: Bring a Menu and Some Water

hedline.hl1: Bring a Menu and Some Water

abstract.p: Beth Zeidel letter says June 7 article on bad lighting in restaurants explains why she accidentally set fire to paper menus in two restaurants while trying to read them by candlelight (S)

block.p: Amanda Hesser's article on restaurant lighting (''Dining by Flashlight: Restaurants Fade to Black,'' June 7) finally gives me a good excuse for accidentally setting fire to the paper menus in two restaurants while holding them over the votive candles on the table. My friends now know to immediately move them out of harm's way as soon as we sit down. If necessary, they read the menu offerings out loud. Maybe waiters should have old-fashioned seltzer bottles readily available to quickly douse the flames.
